item.description:
1. The far right is using AI to sell Hitler to a new generation  The Washington Post
  2. Hitler Speeches Going Viral on TikTok: Everything We Know  Newsweek
  3. Hitler’s AI translated speeches go viral on TikTok – with one video topping 1M views – in troubling trend: report  New York Post
